DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical outcome intrastromal corneal ring segment ( ICRS ) implantation correct keratoconus eye prior refractive surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Intrastromal Corneal Ring Ectasia After Refractive Surgery ( Anel )
DOC.detailed_description: Forty-two eye 26 patient , 14 men 12 woman , ectasia refractive surgery study nonrandomized , retrospective , observational case series . Mean age time ICRS implantation 30,5 year .
DOC.criteria: Patients 19 48 year old Keratoconus ( ectasia ) eye prior refractive surgery Diabetes Autoimmune disease
